title: Elderly Parents, Apology, Christian Counselors, Gender Emotions, Therapy Rules
description:
Dr. Kirk Honda talks about caring for elderly parents, apologizing for hurting the listeners, the ethics of being a Christian Counselor, gender and emotions, and ridiculous therapy rules.

The Psychology In Seattle Podcast.

June 20, 2018.

Email: Contact@PsychologyInSeattle.com

List of all episodes: https://psychologyinseattle.squarespace.com/list-of-episodes

Become a patron of our podcast by going to https://www.patreon.com/PsychologyInSeattle

Music by Bread Knife Incident.
